name: Cat Dewitcher Spray
description: Is your cat working its dark magic against you? With cat dewitcher spray you can fight back, and dewitch that cat!

name: Chicken Pee Yew
description: Do your chickens come in smelling like a barnyard? With chicken pee yew your chickens can smell like fresh sunlight or a mountain breeze! (coming soon: potpouri)

name: Swole Dog Biscuits
description: Is your dog looking scrawny? do the other animals laugh when he goes on guard duty? With swole dog buiscuits your dog will build up - and radiate head of the pack!

name: Quick Nest
description: Is your bird struggling to build to code? Do his nests sometimes fall off trees? With quick nest he can have a modern, up to date nest, in a matter of minutes

name: Lizard Lifts
description: Can your lizard only do push-ups because he has no exercise equipment? With lizard lifts he can really work out!

name: Fish Bubbles
description: Looking for something different for your fish bowl? Does that castle and plastic seaweed seem old and tired? Try fish bubbles -now with a newer, safer formula! Comes in may popular colors.

name: Cat Color
description: Is your cat a boring gray, yellow, white or black? Spray on some cat color and liven that cat up!

name: Doggy Patches
description: Don't let your dog be a prisoner to the shame of mange. Doggy Patches are made of real animal hair and come in a variety of lengths. They blend right into your dog's coat for a natural look.

name: Cricket Tunes
description: Tired of those crickets chirping the same old songs, night after night? With cricket tunes you can expand their repetoir from the oldies but goodies to the most current hits!

name: Hare gliders
description: Tired of being everybody's prey animal? Rise above it all with hare gliders. Will carry most small prey, up to 30lbs. Not available for cats.

name: Bat Mobile
description: Not mobile as in vehicle, but mobile as in a hanging sculpture -but for bats! These mobiles are mounted on poles that stands on the ground and circulate upwards - looks great in any bat cave!

name: Dog Ladders
description: Does your dog want on the roof, but can't get up there? Now he can with dog ladders!
